content:
my boys love anything that goes - cars trains boats and planes - and so when i realized that they didn t have any toy airplanes i just had to do something why not design one
only about three inches long this stuffed plane fits easily into the palm of your hand and that means it s exceptionally quick to make why not crochet a bunch of them - their small size makes them perfect for stuffing in purses or diaper bags to entertain bored children on the go and because they re so quick they make great small last-minute gifts or stocking stuffers for your little pilots
